tha-ap226:1.2_0: for I’ve paid homage to me,
tha-ap226:2.2_0: but I didn’t see fear and dread.
tha-ap226:3.2_0: since I drew in the past.
tha-ap226:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap226:3.4_0: this is the fruit for you.
tha-ap226:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap226:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Rohitassa.
tha-ap226:7.1_0: and the fourth part of the senior monks.
